HeroSection.title: Made By Developers,
HeroSection.description: Reduces operating costs. Save valuable time. Avoid fraud.

BenefitsGrid.description1: Dramatically reduce response times by processing documents in 5 seconds, not minutes.
BenefitsGrid.title2: Save up to 80% in operational costs
BenefitsGrid.description2: Eliminate data entry and reduce administrative costs by up to 80% with automation.
BenefitsGrid.description3: Empower your team to focus on strategic tasks by automating repetitive tasks.
BenefitsGrid.description4: Protect your business from invoice, identity, and expense fraud with intelligent algorithms.

UseCases.title: Use Cases
UseCases.description1: Automate the processing of hospitalization and medical forms, reducing response times by 90% and saving up to 80% in operational costs.
UseCases.description2: Automate the processing of invoices, reducing response times by 90% and saving up to 80% in operational costs.
UseCases.description3: Automate the processing of identity verification, reducing response times by 90% and saving up to 80% in operational costs.
UseCases.description4: Automate the processing of legal and compliance documents, reducing response times by 90% and saving up to 80% in operational costs.
UseCases.description5: Explore our wide range of use cases and find the one that best suits your needs.

ComparisonSection.title: We Ensure You
ComparisonSection.description: Our AI-powered OCR technology ensures that you get accurate data from your documents, no matter what type of document you're processing.
ComparisonSection.without1: Wasting time on manual data entry & error correction tasks
ComparisonSection.without3: Costly to scale document processing with high efficiency
ComparisonSection.without4: Poor quality scans and images cannot be extracted
ComparisonSection.with1: Process documents in seconds with AI-powered OCR
ComparisonSection.with2: Get structured data extracted from any document
ComparisonSection.with3: Save money and time with batch processing
ComparisonSection.with4: Detect document fraud with AI technologies
ComparisonSection.with5: Automate the entire document processing workflow

ReclaimSection.title: Reclaim Your Time and Money with
ReclaimSection.description: Empower your teams with automated data extraction for any document workflow. No more time-wasted on data entry.
